initialScreen.quote: A global healthcare company optimizes IT asset management, improves transparency, and boosts remarketing returns by partnering with Iron Mountain Asset Lifecycle Management.

firstScreen.problemDescription: When seeking a new partner to help manage their extensive IT hardware fleet of assets, the customer’s primary pain points were logistical costs and a lack of granularity in reporting, reducing overall transparency.
firstScreen.savingsDescription: When seeking a new partner to help manage their extensive IT hardware fleet of assets, the customer’s primary pain points were logistical costs and a lack of granularity in reporting, reducing overall transparency.

secondScreen.bottomDescription: The former digital storage system was slow and inefficient, especially for remote access, which frustrated staff when they needed to retrieve content quickly.
secondScreen.mainDescription: A large bank acquired a competitor, which resulted in redundant and costly data center operations.

thirdScreen.description: Prior to partnering with Iron Mountain, the enterprise also faced challenges in optimizing remarketing potential across end-user devices and data center assets.
thirdScreen.metricDescription: data centers requiring expert support for asset refresh and decommissioning projects.
